sprouts

Interface Occurrence

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable

    public interface Occurrence
extends Observable
    This represents an occurrence that can be observed as well as triggered. It allows for the registration of listeners which are invoked when the trigger() method is called. Contrary to events received by property observers, observing an Occurrence does not involve any state.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Occurrence.Executor
      The "occurrence executor" is responsible for executing a given Runnable when an Occurrence is triggered.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Occurrence create()
      Creates a new empty Occurrence that can be observed and triggered.
      static Occurrence of(Observer observer)
      Creates a new Occurrence that can be observed and triggered.
      Occurrence subscribe(Observer observer)
      Subscribes the given listener to this Occurrence.
      void trigger()
      Triggers this Occurrence, which means that all registered listeners will be notified.
      void unsubscribeAll()
      Unsubscribes all listeners from this Occurrence.
      static Occurrence using(Occurrence.Executor executor)
      Creates a new Occurrence that can be observed, triggered and executed asynchronously on a custom event queue, thread pool or any other executor.

      • Methods inherited from interface sprouts.Observable

        unsubscribe

    • Method Detail

      • trigger

        void trigger()
        Triggers this Occurrence, which means that all registered listeners will be notified.

      • subscribe

        Occurrence subscribe(Observer observer)
        Subscribes the given listener to this Occurrence.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        observer - The listener to subscribe.
        Returns:
        This Occurrence, to allow for method chaining.

      • unsubscribeAll

        void unsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribes all listeners from this Occurrence.

      • of

        static Occurrence of(Observer observer)
        Creates a new Occurrence that can be observed and triggered.
        Parameters:
        observer - The first listener to subscribe to the new Occurrence.
        Returns:
        A new Occurrence.

      • create

        static Occurrence create()
        Creates a new empty Occurrence that can be observed and triggered.
        Returns:
        A new Occurrence.

      • using

        static Occurrence using(Occurrence.Executor executor)
        Creates a new Occurrence that can be observed, triggered and executed asynchronously on a custom event queue, thread pool or any other executor.
        Parameters:
        executor - A Consumer of Runnables that will be used to execute the trigger() method.
        Returns:
        A new Occurrence.
